links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Leonard Feinstein''' ([[29 April|April 29]], [[1926]]) is a London-born actor. He changed his stagename to '''Leonard Fenton''' during the Second World War, because his Jewish surname was [[Tolkein|associated with Germany]]. His most famous role is that of [https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/profiles/1791n30gcbLkhZlXzmGpy8X/harold-legg Dr. Harold Legg] in ''Eastenders'', but has also played in many radio plays.

==Roles==
*[[1981]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'': [[Daddy Twofoot]]
*[[1968]]: ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'': [[Thranduil|The Elvenking]]
